item.title: [COSCOP 2018] Introduction to Julia
item.description: Powerpoint Hackmd playground (2020 update: Juliabox not free anymore) Why Julia readability as python, performance as C easy to parallelism benchmarks JoliaInXL folia —> Excel JoliaBox —> Bo
